strings.Value: "It's a pity you couldn't find time to investigate my murder. Our primary piece of evidence — the wild boar's carcass in the Old Sycamore — was torn to pieces, either by local wildlife or starving peasants. Enneo the merchant managed to flee, as well. All the clues have been lost. Now we may as well forget about it."

"It's a pity you couldn't find time to continue investigating my murder. I've learned that a group of travelers visited the bank of the {g|Thorn River}Thorn River{/g}, exactly where the boar appeared before the Old Sycamore. But now the travelers are gone. Enneo the merchant managed to flee, as well. All the clues are lost."
"It's a pity you couldn't find time to visit Enneo the merchant. He managed to escape, and his possessions were stolen by some petty thieves. All the clues are lost now."
